com.apple.mrj.jdirect
Class DoubleArrayStruct

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.apple.mrj.jdirect.Struct
        |
        +--com.apple.mrj.jdirect.DoubleArrayStruct
public class DoubleArrayStruct
extends Struct

DoubleArrayStruct is the base class for Java objects which mimic MacOS structs that in C are allocated as local stack variables - not heap allocated. (e.g. Rect, FSSpec, etc.)

The data for these structs is allocated in the java garbage collected heap in the form of a double[].
